title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1231/98 of 12 June 1998 amending for the 18th time Regulation (EEC) No 3800/81 determining the classification of vine varieties
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1231/98 of 12 June 1998 amending for the 18th time Regulation (EEC) No 3800/81 determining the classification of vine varieties
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3800/81 is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 September 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 June 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
